Armenia coasted to victory with a 4-1 win over Latvia in League C.
Armenias Vahan Bichakhchyan opened the score in the 6th minute with a left footed shot from the center of the box to the high center of the goal.
The score leveled after Georgi Harutyunyans own goal in the 9th minute.
Armenia restored the advantage after an own goal by Kaspars Dubra, Latvia, in the 35th minute.
Lucas Zelaray�1an scored the third goal for Armenia shortly into the second half.
Eduard Spertsyan sealed the score in the 86th minute with a right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner.
Eduard Spertsyan scores the fourth goal of the game in favor of Armenia thanks to a right-footed shot that could not be contained by the opposing goalkeeper.
Georgi Harutyunyan scores an own goal and Latvia manages to tie the game unexpectedly.
Kaspars Dubra scores an own goal and Armenia now takes control of the scoreboard with a one-goal difference.
